body.p: The questions addressed in this Interpretation are:

li.p: how should the requirement ‘… stated in terms of the measuring unit current at the end of the reporting period’ in paragraph 8 of IAS 29 be interpreted when an entity applies the Standard?
how should an entity account for opening deferred tax items in its restated financial statements?
